price: ورته ووايه: زه خو په دې خبره له تاسو څه بدله نه غواړم او نه زه له ځانه جوړونکی يم.
arabic: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qul mā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin wamā anā mina al-mutakalifīna
